sentence.Network_en: Gethings of the San Pablo had taken a shot at a highwayman.

list.abs: " That is not what I mean , " said highwayman ; " you cannot save your money by giving up your life .“这不是我的意思，”强盗说，“你不能以放弃你的生命来换你的钱。”

entry.tran: （旧时的）拦路抢劫的强盗，公路响马
entry.def: In former times, highwaymen were people who stopped travellers and robbed them.

means.word_mean: 1. a holdup man who stops a vehicle and steals from it
